channel.title: Solidifying objects
channel.description:
makeGlobalObject(3333, 3333, 13881, 1, 10); //Fire 13881 is the fire ID, how would I make fire a solid object? I tried adding a solid invisible object at the same coordinates of the fire, but it's really glitchy and sometimes still goes through the fire.
How do I solidify the object: 13881?

item.title: Solidifying objects
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

Yeah, originally, fire can be walked through, but I want it to be a solid object.

BUMP anyone?

Read full topic
